page.title: 03A Day At School
page.content: We have to get to school by 9 O'clock.We line up in the hall in our classes. I and a few of my friends play the recorder in our morning service.We have aprojector and Vic operates it.We have slides and we sing them.After the service we all go into our classrooms and have our first lesson.Normally it is{English or Maths.We have an hour of English and then go out to play. We have a big tarmac play area and a large grassy field{.We play rounders or play with a {ball}.We go and line up when the bell rings.When our teacher comes out we can go in.We have a{Welsh}lesson straight after play for 30 minutes.We then have Maths for 45 minutes until dinner{.School dinners are quite nice. They have hot food.After dinner we have 30mins play.Some of us then have pottery and some go to music.C.Hardine
